name: Chipsounds XML Sound File
summary: Learn about .ARIAX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: ARIAX files allow the sound designer to manually modify the sound using a text editor or an XML editor.

description: File created by chipsounds, a program used to create sounds like those on older arcade machines, game consoles, and computers; stores the sound settings using XML formatting instead of the binary formatting used with .ARIA files.
